name: Haze
description: Free yourself from the manipulative grip of the Mantel Corporation as you unravel the conspiracy you have become entangled in. Haze™, the new AAA shooter from Ubisoft and Free Radical, puts players in the boots of Shane Carpenter, a new recruit in the privately run Mantel army. Download this video and get a glimpse of life as a Mantel Trooper and the experiences of Shane Carpenter.
